title: Beyond Air, Inc. (XAIR) Q1 2026 Earnings Call Transcript
description: Beyond Air, Inc. (NASDAQ:XAIR) Q1 2026 Earnings Conference Call August 12, 2025 4:30 PM ETCompany ParticipantsDouglas Quinton Larson - Chief Financial...
content:
Beyond Air, Inc. (NASDAQ:XAIR) Q1 2026 Earnings Conference Call August 12, 2025 4:30 PM ET

Douglas Quinton Larson - Chief Financial Officer

 Steven Adam Lisi - CEO & Chairman of the Board

Good afternoon, and welcome, everyone, to the Beyond Air Financial Results Call for the fiscal quarter ended June 30, 2025. [Operator Instructions] And now I would like to turn the call over to Corey Davis from Lifesci Advisors. Please go ahead.

Thank you, operator. Good afternoon, everyone, and thank you for joining us. Today, after the market closed, we issued a press release announcing the operational highlights and financial results for Beyond Air's first quarter of fiscal year 2026 ended June 30, 2025. A copy of this press release can be found on our website at www.beyondair.net under the News and Events section.

Before we begin, I would like to remind everyone that we will be making comments and various remarks about future expectations, plans and prospects, which constitute forward-looking statements for purposes of the safe harbor provisions under the Private Securities Litigation Reform Act of 1995. Beyond Air cautions that these forward-looking statements are subject to risks and uncertainties that could cause actual results to differ materially from those indicated. We encourage everyone to review the company's filings with the Securities and Exchange Commission, including, without limitation, the company's most recent Form 10-K and Form 10-Q, which identify specific factors that may cause actual results or events to differ materially from those

summary: Beyond Air, Inc. (NASDAQ:XAIR) is set to host a Q1 2026 earnings conference call for the fiscal quarter ended June 30, 2025. The company's CEO and CFO, Douglas Quinton Larson, and Steven Adam Lisi, will discuss the operational highlights and financial results for the first quarter of the year 2026. These statements are considered forward-oriented by the company and are subject to numerous risks and uncertainties that could cause actual results to differ significantly.

argos_summary: Beyond Air, Inc. held its Q1 2026 Earnings Conference Call on August 12, 2025, to discuss the financial results for the quarter ending June 30, 2025. The call featured remarks from CEO Steven Adam Lisi and CFO Douglas Quinton Larson, highlighting operational achievements and financial performance. The company also issued a press release detailing these results and reminded participants of the forward-looking statements and associated risks.
